ALU_NOP
11111111111111111111111111111111
00000000000000000000000000100000

#A<B
ALU_SLT
00000000000000000000000000001111
00000000000000000000000000010000

#A<B, A negative, B positive
ALU_SLT
11110110111000111111101111011100
00000000000000000000010000000001

#A>B
ALU_SLT
00000000000000000000000000010000
00000000000000000000000000001111

#A=B
ALU_SLT
00000000000000000000000000010000
00000000000000000000000000010000

#A<B
ALU_SLTU
00000000000000000000000000001111
00000000000000000000000000010000

#A<B
ALU_SLTU
11111111111111111111111111111110
11111111111111111111111111111111

#A>B
ALU_SLTU
11111111111111111111111111111111
11111111111111111111111111111110

#A>B
ALU_SLTU
00000000000000000000000000010000
00000000000000000000000000001111

#A=B
ALU_SLTU
00000000000000000000000000010000
00000000000000000000000000010000

#SLL by 1
ALU_SLL
00000000000000000000000000000001
00000000000000000000000000000001

#SLL by 31
ALU_SLL
00000000000000000000000000000001
00000000000000000000000000011111

#SRL by 1
ALU_SRL
00000000000000000000000000000001
00000000000000000000000000000001

#SRL by 31
ALU_SRL
10000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000011111

ALU_SRA

00000000000000000000000000000001

ALU_SRA

#ADD signed 2+1
ALU_ADD
00000000000000000000000000000010
00000000000000000000000000000001

#ADD signed 2+(-1)
ALU_ADD
00000000000000000000000000000010
11111111111111111111111111111111

#ADD signed max. number + 1
ALU_ADD
01111111111111111111111111111111
00000000000000000000000000000001

#SUB signed 5-(-1)
ALU_SUB
00000000000000000000000000000101
11111111111111111111111111111111

#SUB signed 5-5
ALU_SUB
00000000000000000000000000000101
00000000000000000000000000000101

#AND 
ALU_AND
11111111111111110000000000000001
10000000000000011111111111111111

#AND 
ALU_AND
11111111111111111111111111111111
01111111111111101111111111111110

#OR 
ALU_OR
10101010101010101010101010101010
01010101010101010101010101010101

#OR 
ALU_OR
10000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000001

#XOR 
ALU_XOR
10000000000000001000000000000011
10000000000000010000000000000001
